segments.text: I see the woman lost in her task, a picture of domesticity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she polishes that plate, it’s almost mesmerizing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I can't help but notice the puddle forming, steadily widening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in it, yet she doesn’t seem to care at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy is climbing higher, an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t fathom how she hasn’t noticed the chaos unfolding behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s eagerness for a cookie is sweet but misplaced amidst the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone will scold them if they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This contrast between the calm garden outside and the turmoil inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m on edge; it feels like a ticking time bomb waiting to explode.
segments.speaker: PAR
